Title: Management
Description: Managers increase a number of employees you can have. But each additional manager is less effective.

Title: Development
Description: Developers generates more Development Points. And a technical debt if unchecked.

Title: Design
Description: Designers help to create a better looking product with better user experience (UX).

Title: Product
Description: Product managers are crucial to make more consistent products and to maintain focus.

Title: Marketing
Description: Marketing specialists are essential to make your product pop. They are directly responsible for Market Points

Title: QA
Description: Quality Assurance (QA) help your product to be less buggy and more reliable.

Title: Support
Description: Without a support specialists anytime users will discover any issues with the product they will just leave or bother developers directly.
